Text: Corrected Organization AnnouncementFpst Organization Announcement Correction I apologize for the confusion and inconvenience my mistake caused I had indicated that Kenneth Lovejoy would be supporting EES but this is not correct Ken will be supporting OEC Corrected announcement is provided below It is my pleasure to announce that Kenneth Lovejoy has joined Enron Corp EHS Asset Operations He will be reporting directly to Donnie Willmann and will support Central America Caribbean and OEC Ken has over year experience in environmental health and safety for the oil and gas industry He has been working for Enron since and has extensive international experience We are excited to have Ken in our team so please welcome Ken in his new role Henry Van
